name: The Rolling Labs
description:
Welcome to... Rolling Labs!

In this puzzle game, you're tasked to bring the ball to the black hole using your phone's gyroscope, in order to beat the levels.

Features Coins

You can earn coins and collect as much as you can in order to get the highest score

Ball Life

The ball has a life slider, if you, unfortunately, collide with a bomb your life can decrease in a random value from 40 to 60, and if your life gets to 0 you will lose the game and be resettled back on the same level

Trophies

If you complete a stage of the game, you will be rewarded with a trophy that will be displayed on your main menu screen rotating around. There are three achievable trophies

Physics

This game has realistic physics and gravity applied, your phone acts as the game frame, and you turn it in order to move the ball towards the direction of gravity, as simple as in the real game.

Levels

There are 15 levels that increase in difficulty each level and introduce every now and then a new mechanic to play with.

Captures
